title: Please give Sona & Xin Zhao some new lore
body: With you guys going back and re-updating every Demacian's lore, why not go back and get the two you missed?

replies.body: In before {{champion:37}} becomes "The Aspect of Music" & {{champion:5}} becomes a relative of an Ionian champ.
